name: Keep It Running
summary:
It's the time of the Industrial Revolution and you're a worker whom just applied to work at a mysterious toy factory. Unfortunately for you, this factory is unlike any other, its machinery and lack of safety being the lesser dangers to your life. And every day gets more and more challenging...

You're tasked with keeping the production of mysterious toys going at any cost. Your many tasks include keeping the boiler at a good pressure, making sure the steam engine drives the machinery at the right pace and keeping the machinery itself in working order. All whilst your boss constantly keeps an eye on you.
Displease your boss in any way and this will be the last day you did anything, ever.

Can you deal with the stress of working for this monster?
